name: 1 Minute Before Death
description:
1 Minute Before Death is a platformer game where you have to reach the end of the level in less than 1 minute.

You play as Sarah,a 32 years old agender person who has been infected by a virus that will kill them in less than 3 minutes,Sarah will then have to collect 3 pills in 3 different levels to get cured from the virus.
